mapper.sql: a.id, a.pro_id as "process.id", b.proName as "process.proName", a.station_id as "workStationInfos.id", c.stationName as "workStationInfos.stationName", d.lineName as "workStationInfos.line.lineName", d.id as "workStationInfos.line.id", a.del_flag, a.remarks, a.create_by as "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by as "updateBy.id", a.update_date
left join tec_process b on b.id=a.pro_id left join bas_workstationinfos c on c.id=a.station_id left join bas_line d on d.id=c.line_id
mapper.select:
select
from tec_process_station a
where a.del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
order by a.update_date desc
mapper.insert:
insert into tec_process_station( id, pro_id, station_id, del_flag, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date
)values( #{id}, #{process.id}, #{workStationInfos.id}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
